dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description:
An exporter with the features of Sub::Exporter but only core
dependencies
dependencies.name: perl-exporter-tiny

dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.
dependent_to.name: lcov

dependent_to.description: Ensembl Funcgen Perl API and SQL schema.
dependent_to.name: perl-bio-ensembl-funcgen

dependent_to.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)
dependent_to.name: perl-moo

dependent_to.description: Type constraints and coercions for Perl .
dependent_to.name: perl-specio

description: Role::Tiny - Roles: a nouvelle cuisine portion size slice of Moose
name: perl-role-tiny

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
